COST.PLAY_TIME_ACTION:
local filter = Object():LoadTargetDefinition(6) local max_discard = filter:Count() local player = EffectController()
if max_discard > 0 then player:SetTargetCount(max_discard) for i=0,max_discard-1 do player:SetTargetPrompt( i, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CARD_TO_DISCARD" ) end player:ChooseTargets( 0, EffectDC():Make_Targets(0) ) end
COST.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
local filter = Object():LoadTargetDefinition(6) local max_discard = filter:Count() local discard_count = 0
for i=0,max_discard-1 do local card = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(i) if card ~= nil then card:Discard() discard_count = discard_count + 1 end end
ObjectDC():Set_Int(1, discard_count)
